item.title: Why I built Plant Smart
item.author: 0xdeadbeef@devilmayco.de (…Øl«ù…•l·¥â ç)
item.description: Simply put, I love plants and I love animals. I can’t count how many times I’ve been to a plant nursery and had to stop and do a Google search to see if something was safe enough to bring home and keep around our little Pandora, or üêº for short.
